title: Chapelcross: Scotland's first nuclear power station
brief_description: Shows features of the construction of Chapelcross nuclear power station - the first to be built in Scotland. Presented in a style suitable for non-technical audiences, concentrating on the civil engineering work involved in the construction. Scenes of the official opening ceremony are also included.
